original_text: When they reached the Valley of Eshkol, they cut off a branch bearing a single cluster of grapes. Two of them carried it on a pole between them, along with some pomegranates and figs.
korean_text: 또 에스골 골짜기에 이르러 거기서 포도송이가 달린 가지를 베어 둘이 막대기에 꿰어 메고 또 석류와 무화과를 따니라

sentences.original_text: When they reached the Valley of Eshkol
bearing a single cluster of grapes
Two of them carried it on a pole between them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 두 사람이 막대기로 그것을 함께 나르다

sentences.original_text: along with some pomegranates and figs
